title: Bane
content:
d, Cleric, Warlock: Thief of Five Fates, Oath of Vengeance Bane can be cast by using the following items: Gloves of Power will give you bane if you don't have Absolute's mark. Blurg sells The Baneful, a shortsword that gives a chance to Bane the target when a Warlock uses it as their pact weapon or an Eldritch Knight uses it with Weapon Bond.
